docs.text: Getting started Hardware information table, tr, th, td { border: 1px solid gray !important; border-collapse: collapse; } Compute Model name: Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU X5660 @ 2.80GHz Architecture: x86_64 24 core and 48 threads 32GiB system memory Four 8GiB DIMM DDR3 SSD Storage /public 1.2PB usable storage capacity /collab 1.8TB usable storage capacity Web access https://stash.osgconnect.net/public https://stash.osgconnect.net/collab xrootd access You can also access the server using xrootd. Below is an example of copying a file with xrootd. xrdcp root://stash.osgconnect.net:1094//osgconnect/public/<user_id>/<file> -> /tmp
docs.title: Getting started
